A game called "Gravity Bounce" where players bounce on trampolines and try to reach high points while avoiding obstacles.
A sport called "Swimathon" where swimmers compete in a relay race, each leg of the race being a different stroke.
A sport called "Eco-Climb" where climbers scale artificial mountains made of recycled materials, with the goal of reaching the summit.
A sport called "Gymnastics Relay" where teams compete in a series of gymnastic events, with points awarded for perfect execution and teamwork.
A sport called "Robot Soccer" where two teams compete using robots programmed to play soccer, with the goal of scoring goals by kicking a ball into the opposing team's net.
